<strong><font face="宋体"><font size="6"><font color="#ff0000">微软官网正版激活码很多，看到有吾爱坛友在问，分享出来……</font></font></font></strong><br>
<br>

<font face="Calibri"><br>
</font><br>
<font face="Calibri">Key Management Services (KMS) client activation and product keys</font><font face="Calibri">Article</font><font face="Calibri">10/01/2024</font> <font face="Calibri">Windows Command Prompt</font> <font face="Calibri">Copy</font><font face="Calibri">slmgr /ipk WX4NM-KYWYW-QJJR4-XV3QB-6VM33</font><font face="Calibri">Generic Volume License Keys</font><font face="Calibri">In the tables that follow, you'll find the GVLKs for each version and edition of Windows. LTSC is Long-Term Servicing Channel, while LTSB is Long-Term Servicing Branch.</font> <font face="Calibri">Windows Server LTSC</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2025</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2022</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2019</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2016</font><font face="Calibri">Operating system edition</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">KMS Client Product Key</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2025 Standard</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">TVRH6-WHNXV-R9WG3-9XRFY-MY832</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2025 Datacenter</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">D764K-2NDRG-47T6Q-P8T8W-YP6DF</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server 2025 Datacenter: Azure Edition</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">XGN3F-F394H-FD2MY-PP6FD-8MCRC</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server Semi-Annual Channel</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server, versions 20H2, 2004, 1909, 1903, and 1809</font><font face="Calibri">Operating system edition</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">KMS Client Product Key</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server Standard</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">N2KJX-J94YW-TQVFB-DG9YT-724CC</font><font face="Calibri">Windows Server Datacenter</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font face="Calibri">6NMRW-2C8FM-D24W7-TQWMY-CWH2D</font> <font face="Calibri">Important</font> <font face="Calibri">Windows Server, version 20H2 reached end of service on August 9, 2022 and is no longer receiving security updates. This includes the retirement of Windows Server Semi-Annual Channel (SAC) with no future releases.</font> <font face="Calibri">Customers using Windows Server SAC should move to Azure Stack HCI. Alternatively, customers may use the Long-Term Servicing Channel of Windows Server.</font> <font face="Calibri">Windows 11 and Windows 10 Semi-Annual Channel</font><font face="Calibri">See the Windows lifecycle fact sheet for information about supported versions and end of service dates.</font> <font face="Calibri">Operating system edition</font>&nbsp;
